mapper.select: SELECT provider.id, provider.type, provider.`name`, provider.phone, provider.`status`, provider.score, settings.can_pick_up, settings.city_name, settings.intention_scope, skill.serve_type_name, skill.serve_item_name FROM serve_provider AS provider LEFT JOIN serve_provider_settings AS settings ON settings.id = provider.id LEFT JOIN serve_skill AS skill ON skill.serve_provider_id = provider.id WHERE provider.id = #{id}
